divs: Sighting Detailsneighbor and i were talking poeple were sthooting off fireworks as we talk he looked up and ask what was that pointing to an orange glowing object about 1000 to 1500 feet in the air at first i said helecopter but their was no noise it was steady going e to w at about 150 to 300 miles like a small airplane prop it cast a orange light all around it and appeared tobe climing slowly passed over the freeway movingn towards lake then the light just blinked out
Summary: neighbor point to sky asked what that was at first i said helicoper but there was nosound it move in eastery direction then just poff it was gone
